title: LucasArts Outlaws (1997) - Pre-installed for Win7 / Win8.1 x64
description:
This is a pre-installed version of the old classic Outlaws from LucasArts.
It has been tested and verified working on Windows 7 & Windows 8.1 64-bit, with the music and all cutscenes running properly.

The patch 2.0 missions are included. The game has been patched to 2.0.1 along with the Direct3D patch.



To get it running, simply follow these steps:

1. Extract the Outlaws.rar to desired location
2. Mount the ccd-file from the CD 1 folder
3. Run olwin.exe to start the game

Run olcfg.exe to configure resolution and basic graphics options.


NOTE! You should run both olwin.exe and olcfg.exe in WindowsXP SP3 
compatability mode for them to work properly.



The LecD3d.dll file was causing problems and has been swapped with a modified one. I've included the original as LecD3d BACKUP.dll, just in case.
